import React from 'react'; import HowToPlaySubtitle from './HowToPlaySubtitle.js'; import { EventGoalCard } from '../../Footer/EventGoalCard.js'; import { MemberCard } from '../../Footer/MemberCard.js'; import { HelpCircle, ArrowRight, Users, UserCheck, Gift, Repeat } from 'react-feather'; import '../../../css/about.css'; const Charades = (props) => { let cardStyle = { width:"98px", height:"70px", fontSize:"3px", } return (

Step 1

Select a random Event Card. Select players at random based on the amount of participants on the Event Card.

Step 2

Players are given a random Member Card. They act out the scene as if they are that Member.

Step 3

Whoever first guesses all the Members correctly earns a point. The player with the most points wins!

Then repeat from Step 1 until bored.

); } export default Charades;
